alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Warning issued April 06 at 2:47PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a Fire Warning at the request of Oklahoma Forestry Services for southwestern Beaver County. * AT 241 PM CDT, a dangerous wildfire was located 5 miles northeast of Boyd, or 13 miles west of Beaver, moving rapidly south southeast at 3 to 5 mph. * Areas impacted...Western Beaver County. * Additional Information...Beaver River Fire still continues to burn and has flared up and continues to spread south toward Balko. $$ DGW
info.instruction: Be prepared to evacuate quickly if requested and follow all safety instructions from local emergency management officials. Do not drive into smoke. Firefighters and incident responders should anticipate extreme fire behavior including a wind-driven and torching fire.
